Question.Subject: what does it's mean or any of the other ones?
Question.Content: and why do people type it all crazy usually i can figure it out but i just want to know whats the point?? I see it all the time and if you are knowledgable about twitter what is the pound sign in front of words for? to help people find them?? and follow me i have only one Greenfaerie_420 is my user name
Question.ChosenAnswer: ' is html code for an apostrophe. it's means "it is", and its is the possessive form of it. I don't use twitter, so I don't know what they use the pound sign for.

Answer.Content: ' is html code for an apostrophe. it's means "it is", and its is the possessive form of it. I don't use twitter, so I don't know what they use the pound sign for.
